feature.label: Jdt
feature.description: # Bug 149110 - [package explorer] Text Box Filter in Package Explorer # https://bugs.eclipse.org/149110 # # Bug 333428 - [content assist] Creating an anonymous inner class doesn't add a semicolon to enclosing method invocation # https://bugs.eclipse.org/333428 VOBRANCH=333428,https://github.com/kuppe/eclipse.jdt.ui.git,master,eclipse.jdt.ui/
